AbilityTooltips.nevermore_shadowraze1:
The first Shadowraze (Q) causes damage to a distance of 200 units

The second Shadowraze (W) causes damage to the distance of 450 units

The third Shadowraze (E) damage to a distance of 700 units

The maximum number of souls - 36 (+72 damage).This passive swinging on 1 lvl that raise the damage and easily kill creeps
